attributes.action: Ban mandatory covid vaccinations for nhs & health and social care workers
attributes.additional_details: I feel with the current care crisis due to losing many workers due to the vaccination mandate for care home workers, if the government insist on mandating the vaccination for NHS & social care workers there is going to be an even bigger crisis!
attributes.background: I want the Government NOT to mandate the COVID vaccination for health and social care workers and to reinstate care home workers who lost their jobs due to choosing not to be vaccinated

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
